description: Updates some of the parameters for a capability, based on the specified parameters. A trading capability contains the information required to transform incoming EDI documents into JSON or XML outputs.

parameters.name: capabilityId
parameters.description: Specifies a system-assigned unique identifier for the capability.

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: Specifies a structure that contains the details for a capability. edi (dict) --- An EDI (electronic data interchange) configuration object. capabilityDirection (string) --- Specifies whether this is capability is for inbound or outbound transformations. Returns the type of the capability. Currently, only edi is supported. x12Details (dict) --- Returns the details for the EDI standard that is being used for the transformer. Currently, only X12 is supported. X12 is a set of standards and corresponding messages that define specific business documents. transactionSet (string) --- Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee. version (string) --- Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set. Contains the Amazon S3 bucket and prefix for the location of the input file, which is contained in an S3Location object. bucketName (string) --- Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket. key (string) --- Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location. Contains the Amazon S3 bucket and prefix for the location of the output file, which is contained in an S3Location object. Returns the system-assigned unique identifier for the transformer.

nested_params.name: edi
nested_params.description: An EDI (electronic data interchange) configuration object.

nested_params.name: capabilityDirection
nested_params.description: Specifies whether this is capability is for inbound or outbound transformations.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: Returns the type of the capability. Currently, only edi is supported.

nested_params.name: x12Details
nested_params.description: Returns the details for the EDI standard that is being used for the transformer. Currently, only X12 is supported. X12 is a set of standards and corresponding messages that define specific business documents.

nested_params.name: transactionSet
nested_params.description: Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee.

nested_params.name: version
nested_params.description: Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

nested_params.name: inputLocation
nested_params.description: Contains the Amazon S3 bucket and prefix for the location of the input file, which is contained in an S3Location object.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

nested_params.name: outputLocation
nested_params.description: Contains the Amazon S3 bucket and prefix for the location of the output file, which is contained in an S3Location object.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

nested_params.name: transformerId
nested_params.description: Returns the system-assigned unique identifier for the transformer.

parameters.name: instructionsDocuments
parameters.description: Specifies one or more locations in Amazon S3, each specifying an EDI document that can be used with this capability. Each item contains the name of the bucket and the key, to identify the document's location. (dict) --- Specifies the details for the Amazon S3 file location that is being used with Amazon Web Services B2B Data Interchange. File locations in Amazon S3 are identified using a combination of the bucket and key. bucketName (string) --- Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket. key (string) --- Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

nested_items.name: capabilityId
nested_items.description: Returns a system-assigned unique identifier for the capability.

nested_items.name: capabilityArn
nested_items.description: Returns an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a specific Amazon Web Services resource, such as a capability, partnership, profile, or transformer.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Returns the name of the capability, used to identify it.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Returns the type of the capability. Currently, only edi is supported.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: Returns a structure that contains the details for a capability.

nested_items.name: capabilityDirection
nested_items.description: Specifies whether this is capability is for inbound or outbound transformations.

nested_items.name: x12Details
nested_items.description: Returns the details for the EDI standard that is being used for the transformer. Currently, only X12 is supported. X12 is a set of standards and corresponding messages that define specific business documents.

nested_items.name: transactionSet
nested_items.description: Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

nested_items.name: inputLocation
nested_items.description: Contains the Amazon S3 bucket and prefix for the location of the input file, which is contained in an S3Location object.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

nested_items.name: outputLocation
nested_items.description: Contains the Amazon S3 bucket and prefix for the location of the output file, which is contained in an S3Location object.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

nested_items.name: transformerId
nested_items.description: Returns the system-assigned unique identifier for the transformer.

nested_items.name: instructionsDocuments
nested_items.description: Returns one or more locations in Amazon S3, each specifying an EDI document that can be used with this capability. Each item contains the name of the bucket and the key, to identify the document's location.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: Returns a timestamp for creation date and time of the capability.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: Returns a timestamp for last time the capability was modified.
